amendment.description: To require that any debt limit increase be balanced by equal spending cuts over the next decade.
amendment.purpose: To require that any debt limit increase be balanced by equal spending cuts over the next decade.

action.text: Amendment SA 6 proposed by Senator Portman.
Motion to table amendment SA 6 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 44. Record Vote Number: 6.
